gen_ai_statement: Entrepreneurial AI Engineer with 3 years of developing GenAI solutions in high-growth startups, having led 2 companies from concept to revenue generation. I combine strong technical expertise in RAG systems, knowledge graphs, and custom RAG solutions with exceptional client-facing skills to translate business requirements into scalable AI solutions. Proven track record of reducing operational costs by 85% whilst maintaining high accuracy and leading cross-functional teams of 20+ engineers. Seeking challenging and innovative AI Developer opportunities in London with visa sponsorship.

personalInfo.name: Pranit Sehgal
personalInfo.title: Senior AI Developer & GenAI Startup Leader
personalInfo.tagline: GenAI Innovator: Led 2 startups from concept to revenue, architected scalable RAG and knowledge graph solutions, and delivered measurable business value in high-growth environments.
personalInfo.bio: Entrepreneurial AI Engineer with 3 years of experience building GenAI solutions in startups. Led 2 companies from concept to revenue, architected multimodal RAG systems, and delivered business value through technical leadership and client-facing skills. Proven record of reducing costs by 85% while maintaining high accuracy, and leading teams of 20+ engineers. Open to AI Developer opportunities in London, UK.
personalInfo.availability: Open to AI Developer opportunities in London, UK (visa sponsorship required)
highlighted_achievements: Led 2 AI startups from concept to revenue generation, architecting GenAI systems end-to-end.
Reduced operational costs by 85% while maintaining high accuracy in production RAG pipelines.
Managed and scaled cross-functional teams of 20+ engineers in high-growth AI environments.
Built and deployed production knowledge graph and RAG-powered systems for 10k+ users.
Established £150k+ in advertising revenue for RoomieHub within 8 months.

experience.title: Senior AI Developer (Founding Team)
experience.summary: Founding engineer for construction-tech startup, joining pre-revenue as core technical member responsible for building the company's flagship AI product from concept to market launch and establishing revenue streams within 6 months. Architected innovative multimodal RAG system using Knowledge Graph-based RAG models to interpret architectural drawings and construction documents, implementing strategic on-demand vision processing during retrieval rather than at ingestion, reducing processing costs by 85% when handling large document sets (4000+ pages). Led client demos, market research, and technical team of 8.

achievements.description: Architected multimodal RAG system with on-demand vision processing, reducing costs by 85% for large document sets.
achievements.business_value: Enabled scalable, cost-effective document analysis for construction industry.

achievements.description: Led client demos and market research, translating technical capabilities into business value for industry leaders.
achievements.business_value: Directly contributed to early revenue generation and product-market fit.

achievements.description: Promoted to Senior AI Developer within 4 months, leading a team of 8 developers.
achievements.business_value: Scaled technical team and mentored junior engineers.

achievements.description: Developed intelligent bid recommendation system with custom RAG and RLHF, improving user satisfaction and platform adoption.
achievements.business_value: Enhanced user engagement and increased platform adoption.

experience.business_impact: Revenue-generating GenAI solutions for the construction industry; reduced costs by 85%; established product-market fit.
experience.leadership_role: Senior AI Developer, Team Lead (8 developers)

projects.title: Rhythm Password - Keystroke Dynamics Authentication

achievements: Achieved 92% accuracy in real-time user authentication.
Optimised Keras model for edge deployment on Arduino hardware.

publications.title: Gradient Boosting Approach for Sentiment Analysis
publications.impact: Implemented Gradient Boosting for Sentiment Analysis in job recommendation systems, achieving 78.08% accuracy and 0.819 AUC by mining Twitter and Indeed data, demonstrating the potential of NLP techniques for candidate profiling during recruitment.

Cost-conscious architect who optimizes for both performance and budget.
